name: Velocis AI
description: Velocis AI is a next generation AI + Web3 ecosystem designed to bring intelligent, interactive, and practical AI agents into the blockchain world. At its core, Velocis introduces virtual AI characters . not just for casual chat, but for real utility: Veco helps developers with coding, smart contract debugging, and technical education. Voxe focuses on crypto market analysis and sentiment tracking. Velys guides users through Web3 culture, learning, and onboarding. Each AI character is powered by a hybrid architecture (LLM + NLM), giving them accuracy, adaptability, and unique personalities. Users can interact in real time, save sessions as PDFs, and soon connect via wallet login to unlock premium, token powered features.
